channel.title: Can some 1 modify my command and make it work?

item.title: Can some 1 modify my command and make it work?
item.dc:creator: @xx_qwertyuiop_xx xx qwertyuiop xx
item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

He’s checking if the command typed contains the String literal “11283, 6570, 11696, 11700, 11698, 11694, 11235, 4153”.
That doesn’t make any sense. You’re supposed to use || and check for each one separately.

Really. How can 3 people miss that?

Read full topic
item.source: Can some 1 modify my command and make it work?

item.title: Can some 1 modify my command and make it work?

makes no sense[/quote]

I think he’s doing this for a 508 by the word cmd and not command

item.title: Can some 1 modify my command and make it work?
item.dc:creator: @silabgarza silabgarza
item.description:
@silabgarza wrote:

oooooooooooooh

}if (cmd[0].equals("item")) { if (p.rights <= 1) { if (p.duelFight()) { p.frames.sendMessage(p, "You cannot spawn items while dueling."); return; } if (Server.engine.wildernessArea(p.absX, p.absY)) { p.frames.sendMessage(p, "You cannot spawn items in the wilderness."); return; } } Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, Integer.parseInt(cmd[1]), Integer.parseInt(cmd[2])); } else { if (cmd[0].contains("11283, 6570, 11696, 11700, 11698, 11694, 11235, 4153")) { p.frames.sendMessage(p, "You cannot spawn this item, Kill For It!."); return; }

try that

item.title: Can some 1 modify my command and make it work?
item.dc:creator: @silabgarza silabgarza
item.description:
@silabgarza wrote:

}if (cmd[0].equals("item")) { if (p.rights <= 1) { if (p.duelFight()) { p.frames.sendMessage(p, "You cannot spawn items while dueling."); return; } if (Server.engine.wildernessArea(p.absX, p.absY)) { p.frames.sendMessage(p, "You cannot spawn items in the wilderness."); return; } } if (Integer.parseInt(cmd[2]) <= 1000) { Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, Integer.parseInt(cmd[1]), Integer.parseInt(cmd[2])); } } else { if (cmd[0].contains("11283, 6570, 11696, 11700, 11698, 11694, 11235, 4153")) { p.frames.sendMessage(p, "You cannot spawn this item, Kill For It!."); }

like that? so they cant spawn more then a certain amount at a time?
i made it only add the item if the amount is under 1001 (1-1000)

item.source: Can some 1 modify my command and make it work?

item.title: Can some 1 modify my command and make it work?
item.dc:creator: @xx_qwertyuiop_xx xx qwertyuiop xx
item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

That’s not how the contains method works…

Use an array to hold the item id of all the restricted items, then iterate through the array in the command to check if the item they’re spawning matches one of the items.

Read full topic
item.source: Can some 1 modify my command and make it work?

item.title: Can some 1 modify my command and make it work?

item.description:

}if (cmd[0].equals("item")) { if (p.rights <= 1) { if (p.duelFight()) { p.frames.sendMessage(p, "You cannot spawn items while dueling."); return; } if (Server.engine.wildernessArea(p.absX, p.absY)) { p.frames.sendMessage(p, "You cannot spawn items in the wilderness."); return; } } Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, Integer.parseInt(cmd[1]), Integer.parseInt(cmd[2])); } else { if (cmd[0].contains("11283, 6570, 11696, 11700, 11698, 11694, 11235, 4153")) { p.frames.sendMessage(p, "You cannot spawn this item, Kill For It!."); }
